marklogic.body: I just wondered cause he had so many lung problems at birth. He didn't even Bounce back in the NICU as quick as they assumed. And the NICU dr's said he'd be more susceptible to becoming an asthmatic. No-they haven't done any cultures. Up until now-they were just treating his ears and thinking the antibiotics would knock out the Cough too. They were assuming it was a Cold etc. The antibiotics aren't touching his ears either. But since the Cough hasn't gotten any better and has stayed wet....now they worry. It's all so frustrating.
